submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        return rt(nums,k)
    
def rt(n,k):
    z=[]
    i=0
    j=len(n)-1
    v={}
    z=[]
    dp=[0]
    r1=0
    while(i<=j):
        z.append([n[i],n[j]])
        r1 = max(r1, abs(n[i] - n[j]))
        i=i+1
        j=j-1
    dp=[len(n)]*(r1+1+k)
    vp=[0]*len(dp)
    gp = [0] * len(dp)

    for i in z:
        [a1,b1]=i
        r2=abs(a1-b1)
        r3=max(a1,b1,abs(a1-k),abs(b1-k))
        r1=min(a1,b1,a1-k,k-a1,k-b1,b1-k)
        r1=max(r1,0)

        vp[r1]+=1
        vp[r2]+=1
        gp[r2]-=1
        if(r3+1<len(dp)):
            vp[r3+1]-=1
    s=0
    c=len(n)

    for i in  range(0,len(dp)):
        s=s+vp[i]
        c=min(c,len(n)-s)
        s=s+gp[i]
    return c
